message.body: Steve...
Hey
Hi! Um do I'm pretty uncomfortable and would like advice.
*so
Sure. What's up?
So one of my really close friends is vacationing in Texas.
She has a boyfriend who I think is really nice. We've talked a few times when I hung out with her and he was there.
He FB messaged me earlier after accepting my friend request. And I'm not sure but I think he's like hitting on me.
I'm not sure but I'm feeling uncomfortable.
Oh and before that he told me that they are "in between stuff" right now.
I didn't want to know that!
What does that even mean?
I'm not quite sure what that means either... What's he saying that makes you think he's hitting on you? (You seem to be attracting a lot of guys lately btw lol)
I'm pretty much done with this conversation
Ohhhh no no no no!
I want to send you the messages!
If you're feeling uncomfortable, I would just leave it alone just like you're doing.
Am I over thinking it?
Is Uyen his Gf?
Yup.
The first one seems odd, but the second doesn't seem too bad. But I'd just stop talking to him.
I just think it's kind of weird to say that to a friend of a woman you're seeing.
I'm thinking of an ending point.
Yeah, it is weird. Don't really have to end it. Just...stop? Lol

I'm just worried that I'm overreacting and they could be fine. Like he's generally a very friendly person. It's his personality. But in any case, she's one of my oldest friends and that takes priority.
Absolutely. Don't want to do anything to jeopardize that.
Jeez, it's hopping in the radiology department!
You're in the radiology department?
Yes I was. It was packed!
Are you alright? Why are you there?
Oh yea I'm fine! Took my mom to her doctor's appointment. She got an ultrasound.
How's your day?
Is your mom alright?
It's wasn't too bad. Had to meet contractors at the Crowne to go over building a ballroom.
It's a routine thing she has to get done every six months for her liver medicine. She had to get an abdominal ultrasound to make sure everything's okay
Ohhh fancy! That sounds like fun!!!
Oh alright. That's good.
Totally listening to Wicked at the gym right now. Lol
Good choice for workout music...hahah. That's funny, I just got home from seeing "Into The Woods"!
